forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
